1.name: Alien
1.description: After a space merchant vessel perceives an unknown transmission as a distress call, its landing on the source moon finds one of the crew attacked by a mysterious lifeform, and they soon realize that its life cycle has merely begun.

2.name: Apocalypse Now
2.description: A U.S. Army officer serving in Vietnam is tasked with assassinating a renegade Special Forces Colonel who sees himself as a god.

3.name: The Warriors
3.description: In the near future, a charismatic leader summons the street gangs of New York City in a bid to take it over. When he is killed, The Warriors are falsely blamed and now must fight their way home while every other gang is hunting them down.

4.name: Caligola
4.description: Details the graphic and shocking, yet undeniably tragic story of Rome's most infamous Caesar, Gaius Germanicus Caligula.

5.name: Mad Max
5.description: In a self-destructing world, a vengeful Australian policeman sets out to stop a violent motorcycle gang.

6.name: Stalker
6.description: A guide leads two men through an area known as the Zone to find a room that grants wishes.

7.name: Meatballs
7.description: Wacky hijinks of counselors and campers at a less-than-average summer camp.

8.name: Moonraker
8.description: James Bond investigates the mid-air theft of a space shuttle, and discovers a plot to commit global genocide.

9.name: Star Trek: The Motion Picture
9.description: When an alien spacecraft of enormous power is spotted approaching Earth, Admiral James T. Kirk resumes command of the overhauled USS Enterprise in order to intercept it.

10.name: All That Jazz
10.description: Director/choreographer Bob Fosse tells his own life story as he details the sordid life of Joe Gideon, a womanizing, drug-using dancer.

11.name: Life of Brian
11.description: Born on the original Christmas in the stable next door to Jesus, Brian of Nazareth spends his life being mistaken for a messiah.

12.name: Kramer vs. Kramer
12.description: Ted Kramer's wife leaves him, allowing for a lost bond to be rediscovered between Ted and his son, Billy. But a heated custody battle ensues over the divorced couple's son, deepening the wounds left by the separation.

13.name: Rocky II
13.description: Rocky struggles in family life after his bout with Apollo Creed, while the embarrassed champ insistently goads him to accept a challenge for a rematch.

14.name: Escape from Alcatraz
14.description: Alcatraz is the most secure prison of its time. It is believed that no one can ever escape from it, until three daring men make a possible successful attempt at escaping from one of the most infamous prisons in the world.

15.name: Nosferatu: Phantom der Nacht
15.description: Count Dracula moves from Transylvania to Wismar, spreading the Black Plague across the land. Only a woman pure of heart can bring an end to his reign of horror.

16.name: Phantasm
16.description: A teenage boy and his friends face off against a mysterious grave robber known only as the Tall Man, who keeps a lethal arsenal of terrible weapons with him.

17.description: A Hollywood composer goes through a mid-life crisis and becomes infatuated with a sexy, newly married woman.

18.name: Hair
18.description: Claude Bukowski leaves the family ranch in Oklahoma for New York where he is rapidly embraced into the hippie group of youngsters led by Berger, yet he's already been drafted. He soon falls in love with Sheila Franklin, a rich girl but still a rebel inside.

19.name: The Jerk
19.description: A simple minded, sheltered country boy suddenly decides to leave his family home to experience life in the big city, where his naivety is both his best friend, and worst enemy.

20.description: Hysterical Californians prepare for a Japanese invasion in the days after Pearl Harbor.

21.name: Tess
21.description: A strong-willed young peasant girl attracts the affection of two men.

22.name: The Amityville Horror
22.description: Newlyweds move into a large house where a mass murder was committed, and experience strange manifestations which drive them away.

23.name: The Black Hole
23.description: A research vessel finds a missing ship, commanded by a mysterious scientist, on the edge of a black hole.

24.name: Manhattan
24.description: The life of a divorced television writer dating a teenage girl is further complicated when he falls in love with his best friend's mistress.

25.name: The China Syndrome
25.description: A reporter finds what appears to be a cover-up of safety hazards at a nuclear power plant.

26.name: Breaking Away
26.description: A small-town boy obsessed with the Italian cycling team vies for the affections of a college girl.

27.name: Zombi 2
27.description: Strangers searching for a young woman's missing father arrive at a tropical island where a doctor desperately seeks the cause and cure of a recent epidemic of the undead.

28.name: The Wanderers
28.description: Set against the urban jungle of 1963 New York's gangland subculture, this coming of age teenage movie is set around the Italian gang the Wanderers. Slight comedy, slight High School angst ...                See full summary »

29.name: Being There
29.description: A simpleminded, sheltered gardener becomes an unlikely trusted advisor to a powerful businessman and an insider in Washington politics.

30.name: Quadrophenia
30.description: Jimmy loathes his job and parents. He seeks solace with his mod clique, scooter riding and drugs, only to be disappointed.

31.name: The North Avenue Irregulars
31.description: When crooks set up operations in a traditional town, a minister and a group of church ladies are willing to do anything, no matter how wacky, to get them out.

32.name: Dracula
32.description: In 1913, the charming, seductive and sinister vampire Count Dracula travels to England in search of an immortal bride.

33.name: The Muppet Movie
33.description: Kermit and his newfound friends trek across America to find success in Hollywood, but a frog legs merchant is after Kermit.

34.name: The Brood
34.description: A man tries to uncover an unconventional psychologist's therapy techniques on his institutionalized wife, amidst a series of brutal murders.

35.name: Hardcore
35.description: A conservative Midwest businessman ventures into the sordid underworld of pornography in California to look for his runaway teenage daughter who is making porno films in California's porno pits.

36.name: Beneath the Valley of the Ultra-Vixens
36.description: Believe it or not even in Smalltown USA there are still people who are unfulfilled and unrelieved in the midst of plenty. Levonna & Lamar could have the perfect relationship if it were not ...                See full summary »

37.name: More American Graffiti
37.description: College graduates deal with Vietnam and other issues of the late 1960s.

38.name: Love at First Bite
38.description: This vampire spoof has Count Dracula moving to New York to find his Bride, after being forced to move out of his Transylvanian castle. There with the aid of assistant Renfield, he stumbles ...                See full summary »

39.name: Norma Rae
39.description: A young single mother and textile worker agrees to help unionize her mill despite the problems and dangers involved.

40.name: The Black Stallion
40.description: While traveling with his father, young Alec becomes fascinated by a mysterious Arabian stallion who is brought on board and stabled in the ship he is sailing on. When it tragically sinks ...                See full summary »

41.name: ...and justice for all.
41.description: A lawyer is forced to defend a guilty judge, while defending other innocent clients, and trying to find punishment for the guilty and provide justice for the innocent.

42.name: North Dallas Forty
42.description: A semi-fictional account of life as a professional (American-style) football player. Loosely based on the Dallas Cowboys team of the early 1970s.

43.name: Tourist Trap
43.description: A group of young friends stranded at a secluded roadside museum are stalked by a masked assailant who uses his telekenetic powers to control the attraction's mannequins.

44.name: Wanda Nevada
44.description: Romantic drama following the fortunes of a drifter named Beaudray Demerille (Peter Fonda) who wins a young orphan named Wanda (13-year-old Brooke Shields) in a poker game and takes her gold...                See full summary »

45.name: Scum
45.description: An uncompromising story of life in a British juvenile offender institution in the 70's.

46.name: Rupan sansei: Kariosutoro no shiro
46.description: A dashing thief, his gang of desperadoes and an intrepid policeman struggle to free a princess from an evil count's clutches, and learn the hidden secret to a fabulous treasure that she holds part of a key to.

47.name: The Rose
47.description: The tragic life of a self-destructive female rock star who struggles to deal with the constant pressures of her career and the demands of her ruthless business manager.

48.name: Die Blechtrommel
48.description: In 1924, Oskar Matzerath is born in the Free City of Danzig. At age three, he falls down a flight of stairs and stops growing. In 1939, World War II breaks out.

49.name: H.O.T.S.
49.description: College exploitation film focusing on the wild escapades of the women of H.O.T.S. Sorority. The antics include but are certainly not limited to a wet t-shirt contest, a sky-diving episode, ...                See full summary »

50.name: Time After Time
50.description: H.G. Wells pursues Jack the Ripper to the 20th Century when the serial murderer uses the future writer's time machine to escape his time period.
